item.title: Elvish, an awesome Unix shell
item.description: I’m always on the lookout for new toys, particularly if they make my work more productive or enjoyable. For a couple of months now I have been using a new Unix shell called Elvish as my default login shell on macOS, and I love it. Itâ€™s a young project but very usable and with some very nice features. Here are a few of the things I like about it: The Elvish language is clean and powerful, with clear syntax.
